Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise-D
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack with your primary weapon, you may fire in any direction at Range 1-2 with 3 attack dice.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Khazara
Ship.Ability: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, add +1 attack die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Maht-H'A
Ship.Ability: Any ship attacking you at Range 1 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Reliant
Ship.Ability: You gain +1 attack die when firing at Range 1.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Enterprise
Ship.Ability: The USS Enterprise can perform an Action listed on its Action Bar while it has an Auxiliary Power token.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Valdore
Ship.Ability: If you perform a Green Maneuver, add +1 attack die for the remainder of this round.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Apnex
Ship.Ability: ACTION (once/game): Every ship at range 1 sustains 1 damage (including this ship). During the Planning Phase this ship must choose a '1' Maneuver (forward, bank or turn) for the rest of the game.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Gr'oth
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend against a ship at Range 1, roll 1 extra defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Negh'var
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within your firing arc at Range 1-2 and roll 3 attack dice. For each [DAMAGE] result disable 1 of that ship's Shields. If possible, you may play Klingon Boarding Party as a free action this turn.

Ship.Title: Kraxon
Ship.Ability: Whenever a friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship receives damage you may transfer any amount of that damage to your own Shields, if possible.

Ship.Title: Gor Portas
Ship.Ability: Although you must be Target Locked on a ship to fire a Torpedo at it, you do not need to discard your Target Lock when doing so.

Ship.Title: Krayton
Ship.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields to gain +1 attack die this round. You may re-roll all of your blank results once.

Ship.Title: Deep Space 9 (Federation)
Ship.Ability: Same as Bajoran version. This is a workaround until I get multi-faction working.

Ship.Title: Deep Space 9 (Bajoran)
Ship.Ability: Same as Federation version. This is a workaround until I get multi-faction working.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Ch'tang
Ship.Ability: If you initiate an attack while cloaked, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Ship.Title: P.W.B. Aj'Rmr
Ship.Ability: Each time you attack, you may re-roll 1 of your attack dice for every damage card assigned to your ship.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Defiant
Ship.Ability: When defending, convert all of your opponent's [CRITICAL] results into [HIT] results.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Kronos One
Ship.Ability: Any ship attacking you at Range 3 rolls 1 less attack die.

Ship.Title: I.R.W. Praetus
Ship.Ability: You may use the [CLOAK] Action even if you have no Active Shields. Whenever you choose the [CLOACK] Action, roll 1 attack die. On a [BATTLESTATIONS] result, your Hull sustains 1 Damage.

Ship.Title: 5th Wing Patrol Ship
Ship.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. When defending this round, roll one less defense die.

Ship.Title: I.K.S. Koraga
Ship.Ability: Each time you defend while Cloaked, roll +1 defense die

Ship.Title: Koranak
Ship.Ability: Instead of making a normal attack, you may spend a [SCAN] Token to attack 2 different ships with your Primary Weapon at -2 attack dice each.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Excelsior
Ship.Ability: After you move, if no enemy ships are within Range 1 of your ship, you may perform a [SCAN] action as a free action.

Ship.Title: R.I.S. Vo
Ship.Ability: After you move, you may perform an [EVASIVE] action as a free action. If you do so, you cannot attack during this round.

Ship.Title: U.S.S. Sutherland
Ship.Ability: When you initiate an attack at range 3, you may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once.

Captain.Title: Jean-Luc Picard
Captain.Ability: Each round you may perform one of the following actions as a free action: [EVASIVE] [TARGET LOCK] [SCAN] [BATTLESTATIONS]. You may use this action even if your ship does not have it in the Action bar.

Captain.Title: William T. Riker
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If you are attacked this round at Range 1, Roll 2 attack dice. Any [DAMAGE] or [CRITICAL] result damages the attacking ship as normal, even if your ship is destroyed by their attack. The attacking ship does not roll any defense dice.

Captain.Title: Nu'Daq
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into a [DAMAGE] result.

Captain.Title: Toreth
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may convert 1 [DAMAGE] result into a [CRITICAL] result.

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: You may use any Upgrades without paying a faction penalty. During an attack, if you spend a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token, each of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results become a [CRITICAL] instead of a [DAMAGE].

Captain.Title: Khan Singh
Captain.Ability: (Gen-Con Promo) You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Khan or any Talent Upgrade to your ship. If any Captain in play has a higher Skill Number than Khan, Khan's Skill Number equals that Captains Skill Number.

Captain.Title: Clark Terell
Captain.Ability: Any friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 defense die.

Captain.Title: James T. Kirk
Captain.Ability: Any Federation [TALENT] Upgrades you purchase for Kirk cost exactly 3 Squadron Points and are placed face down beside his card. Each Talent remains face down until you decide to use it, and then it is turned face up for the rest of the game.

Captain.Title: Christopher Pike
Captain.Ability: All of your [CREW] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Donatra
Captain.Ability: All other friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gains +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Tomalak
Captain.Ability: When firing at Range 3 the defending ship does not roll an extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Mirok
Captain.Ability: After you move, if at least one friendly ship is within Range 1 of your ship, repair 1 damage to your Hull or Shields.

Captain.Title: Koloth
Captain.Ability: Each time an enemy ship attacks you, you may force that ship to re-roll 1 attack die of your choice.

Captain.Title: Krell
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 of your [BATTLE STATIONS] results.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: After you move, choose 1 friendly ship within Range 1-2 whose Captain has a lower Skill than Martok's. The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free Action.

Captain.Title: Gowron
Captain.Ability: ACTION:All other friendly Klingon ships within Range 1-2 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round.

Captain.Title: Gul Ranor
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Perform an additional 1 [STRAIGHT] or 2 [STRAIGHT] maneuver. Place an Auxiliary Power Token next to your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Danar
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll 1 blank result.

Captain.Title: Thot Gor
Captain.Ability: All your [WEAPON] Upgrades cost -1 Squadron Point.

Captain.Title: Sar
Captain.Ability: When defending, your ship rolls 1 extra defense die.

Captain.Title: Daimon Tog
Captain.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Disable 1 of your non-disabled Crew Upgrades and then disable 1 Crew Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Captain.Title: Martok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Target all friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship whose Captains have a lower Skill than Martok's. The target ships gain +1 attack die and may re-roll 1 of their attack dice this round.

Captain.Title: Letant
Captain.Ability: Each round, when defending, you may force one opponent to re-roll one of their [CRITICAL] results.

Captain.Title: Benjamin Sisko
Captain.Ability: Once per round, you may re-roll any one of your attack or defense dice.

Captain.Title: Kira Nerys
Captain.Ability: If a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade. You do not pay a Faction penalty when assigning Kira Nerys to a Federation ship.

Captain.Title: Gorkon
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable Gorkon to perform this Action. Your ship and every ship that attacks you this round rolls 2 less attack dice.

Captain.Title: Chang
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Spend your target lock to perform this action. Disable the Captain Card on the ship that was target locked.

Captain.Title: Valdore
Captain.Ability: When attacking, if your ship is not in the target ship's forward firing arc, add +1 attack die.

Captain.Title: Weyoun
Captain.Ability: Disable Weyoun to prevent 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades from being disabled or discarded this round.

Captain.Title: Luaran
Captain.Ability: One of your Dominion Upgrades costs -2 Squadron Points.

Captain.Title: Worf
Captain.Ability: When attacking, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Kurn
Captain.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, gain +1 attack die. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Captain.Title: Gul Dukat
Captain.Ability: Your ship may perform an [EVASIVE] or a [BATTLESTATIONS] Action as a free Action each round.

Captain.Title: Gul Evek
Captain.Ability: Each time you defend, you may re-roll all of your blank results one time.

Captain.Title: Data
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your crew upgrades and one of your weapon upgrades to target all cloaked ship at range 1-3. They immediately flip their cloak tokens to the red side.

Captain.Title: Alidar Jarok
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Discard your [TALENT] upgrade to target 1 ship at range 1-2. Neither of your ships may attack each other this round.

Captain.Title: Hikaru Sulu
Captain.Ability: ACTION: Disable one of your [CREW] upgrades to remove an opponent's [TARGET LOCK] token from your ship. Remove the corresponding token from the opponent's ship as well.

Captain.Title: Styles
Captain.Ability: Add 1 additional [TECH] icon to your ship's upgrade bar.

Upgrade.Title: Engage
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, you may immediately perform an additional Green Maneuver of your choice. Place an Auxiliary Power Token besides your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Worf
Upgrade.Ability: Disable this card to re-roll your entire attack roll. You must re-roll all of the dice and keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Miles O'Brien
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to disable any 1 Upgrade on another ship at Range 1-3. This ability may be used against a ship that is Cloaked.

Upgrade.Title: Geordi LaForge
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it, you may force one ship you attacked this round to re-roll one defense die of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: Data
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Place 2 [EVASION] Tokens beside your ship and reduce our total attack dice by 2 this round. You cannot perform an [EVASION] Action this round, even as a free Action.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Antimatter Mines
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card and place a Minefield Token in your rear firing arc at Range 1. If you place this token on a ship, or if a ship enters the minefield, roll 4 attack dice. Any [DAMAGE] or [CRITICAL] damages the ship as normal. The affected ship does not roll any defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Konmel
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, you may repair 1 Shield Token.

Upgrade.Title: Klag
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Klag and one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes (Vor'cha Bonus)
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Vor'cha class ship add +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Tractor Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1 and roll 2 attack dice. For every [DAMAGE] result, that ship rolls 1 less defense die against your next attack.

Upgrade.Title: Advanced Weapon System
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking, you may disable this card before rolling any dice to keep your [CLOAK] token from flipping to its red side.

Upgrade.Title: Counter Attack
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you ship's Shields or Hull are damaged by a ship in your forward firing arc this round, you may immediately make 1 free attack against that ship. You may not make this attack if your ship is destroyed.

Upgrade.Title: N'Vek
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable 1 of your Active Shields in order to add +1 attack die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Bochra
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Bochra and one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll all your blank results one time. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Artificial Quantum Singularity
Upgrade.Ability: While your ship is Cloaked, you may roll your full defense dice in spite of the presence of an opposing ship's [SCAN] Token.

Upgrade.Title: I Stab at Thee
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship was just destroyed, roll 3 attack dice and inflict the resulting damage on all ships within Range 1 of your ship. These ships do not roll defense dice against this damage.

Upgrade.Title: Superior Intellect
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Steal 1 faceup Upgrade Card of your choice from that ship, even if the Upgrade exceeds your ship's restriction.

Upgrade.Title: Kyle
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a Green Maneuver this round, repair 1 Shield Token and reduce your total attack dice by 2 this round.

Upgrade.Title: Pavel Chekov
Upgrade.Ability: Your ship can remove 1 Auxiliary Power Token after performing a White Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Follower of Khan
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard this card and one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Joachim
Upgrade.Ability: Each time you inflict a [CRITICAL] on an enemy ship's Hull, you may draw 2 Damage Cards (instead of 1) and choose which one to place beside the enemy's Ship Card, discard the unused Damage Card.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Cheat Death
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship was just destroyed, discard this card to remove Damage Cards one at a time from your Ship Card until the amount of damage is 1 point less than your Hull Value. Flip all remaining Damage Cards face down.

Upgrade.Title: Cochrane Deceleration Maneuver
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you performed a [1 FORWARD] Maneuver this round, discard this Upgrade to Come About [REVERSE DIRECTION]. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: Corbomite Maneuver
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this Upgrade to prevent all enemy ships from attacking you this round. You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Leonard McCoy
Upgrade.Ability: Discard McCoy to allow 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to perform its Action as a free Action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Hikaru Sulu
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Add 2 to your Agility for the rest of this round. Each time you defend this round, you may convert 1 [BATTLE STATIONS] result into a [EVASIVE] result.

Upgrade.Title: Mr. Spock
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it when you attack, you may convert all your [BATTLE STATIONS] results into [HIT] results.

Upgrade.Title: Nyota Uhura
Upgrade.Ability: Discard Uhura immediately before you move in order to change your Maneuver for this round.

Upgrade.Title: Montgomery Scott
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable 2 of your Shields in order to gain +2 attack dice this round. -OR- Repair 1 Shield Token and reduce your total attack dice by 2 this round.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert one [BATTLE STATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL HIT] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: All Forward Disruptor Banks
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to add +1 attack die to an attack in your forward arc this round.

Upgrade.Title: Tactical Officer
Upgrade.Ability: When removing your target lock from an opposing ship in order to re-roll your attack dice, you may re-roll each attack die an additional time.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Plasma Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll all your blank results one time. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Parem
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If you ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Parem and one [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Varel
Upgrade.Ability: Discard this card to cancel a single attack against her ship before any dice are rolled. The canceled attack cannot be directed against a different ship. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any ship that is not a Romulan Science Vessel.

Upgrade.Title: Interphase Generator
Upgrade.Ability: When defending while you are Cloaked, you may discard this card after all the dice have been rolled to reduce the damage from a single attack to exactly 1 [DAMAGE].

Upgrade.Title: Muon Feedback Wave
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to place a Muon Token beside a ship at Range 1. This upgrade may only be purchased for a Romulan Science Vessel.

Upgrade.Title: Sabotage
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this Upgrade to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard 1 [WEAPON] or [TECH] Upgrade on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Korax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Korax and any 2 [CREW] Upgrades of your choice on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Cyrano Jones
Upgrade.Ability: You begin the game with one Tribble Token beside your Ship Card

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert one [BATTLE STATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL HIT] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Magnetic Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card and 1 Active Shield to perform this attack. Each [CRITICAL HIT] that would damage on the opponent's Shield's (sic) instead inflicts 1 [HIT] on the opponent's Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Projected Stasis Field
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and discard this Upgrade to target a ship at Range 1-2. That ship must disable all of its remaining Shields and cannot attack this round. Your ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Klingon Boarding Party
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION:If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard this card to disable all Upgrades and remove all [BATTLESTATIONS] Tokens on the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: In'cha
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION:Discard this card to perform one additional Maneuver of your choice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Drex
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION:When attacking this round, you may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result and all of your other [BATTLESTATIONS] results into [DAMAGE] results.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes (Negh'Var Bonus)
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Negh'Var class ship add +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Tractor Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION:Target a ship at Range 1 and roll 2 attack dice. For every [DAMAGE] result, that ship rolls 1 less defense die against your next attack.

Upgrade.Title: Glinn Telle
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target 1 ship in your forward firing arc at Range 1-3. That ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Forward Weapons Grid
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You must divide the attack between 2 different ships in your forward firing arc. You may divide your attack dice however your like, but you must roll at least 1 attack die against each ship.

Upgrade.Title: Antiproton Scan
Upgrade.Ability: If a [SCAN] Token is beside your ship, add +1 attack die when firing against a ship that has no Active Shields.

Upgrade.Title: EM Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target a ship at Range 1-2. The targeted ship rolls 1 less attack die and 1 less defense die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Breen Aide
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] Token beside it when you attack, you may convert 1 blank result into [DAMAGE] result.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Dissipator
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the target suffers no damage, receives 1 Energy Dampening Token, and you may immediately attack the same ship again with another weapon. This upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Breen ship.

Upgrade.Title: Conditional Surrender
Upgrade.Ability: When your ship is attacked, before any dice are rolled, discard all of your Crew Upgrades to cancel the attack. You must have at least 1 Crew Upgrade on your ship in order to use this ability.

Upgrade.Title: EM Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not in your forward firing arc. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the target ship. The target ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Farek
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields to target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard Farek and 1 Crew Upgrade on the target ship. If there is a [SCAN] Token beside your ship, you may perform this action as a free Action.

Upgrade.Title: Missile Launchers
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. Make 2 attacks against ship(s) in your forward firing arc. Roll 2 attack dice for each of these attacks. Any [CRITICAL] results that would damage an opponent's Shields inflict critical damage to that ship's Hull instead.

Upgrade.Title: Defense Condition One
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to place a [BATTLESTATION] Token beside your ship and all friendly ships within Range 1-2 of your ship (even if there is already one there).

Upgrade.Title: Barrage of Fire
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card to perform this attack. Target 1 friendly ship within Range 1 of your ship. Target ship may not make a normal attack this round. Instead, add the Primary Weapon value of that ship to your attack roll for this attack. Both ships must have the enemy ship within their forward firing arcs. Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside both ships.

Upgrade.Title: Secondary Shield Emitters
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to repair 1 Shield Token. If you attack this round, roll 1 less attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Synon
Upgrade.Ability: When performing a [SENSOR ECHO] Action, you may use a 1, 2 or 3 maneuver template.

Upgrade.Title: Invasion Plans
Upgrade.Ability: When you initiate an attack against a ship at Range 2-3 while you are Cloaked, you may discard this card to force that ship to roll 2 less defense dice against your attack.

Upgrade.Title: Romulan Pilot
Upgrade.Ability: After you move, you may discard this card to place a [SCAN] Token beside your ship as a free Action. If you do so, you may immediately make an additional Green Maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Additional Weapons Array
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to make this attack. You may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATION] results into 1 [CRITICAL] result.

Upgrade.Title: Nullifier Core
Upgrade.Ability: Each time you defend while Cloaked, you may re-roll 1 of your defense dice. Discard this card if you ship sustains any damage to its Hull.

Upgrade.Title: Quantum Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your [TARGET LOCK] and disable this card to perform this attack. If the target ship is hit, add 1 [HIT] result to your total damage. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaking Device
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable this card to perform the [CLOAK] Action. While you have a [CLOAK] token beside your ship, you may perform the [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this card is disabled. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any ship other than the U.S.S. Defiant.

Upgrade.Title: Worf
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. That ship rolls 2 less attack dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Attack Pattern Delta
Upgrade.Ability: Disable this card to re-roll your entire defense roll. You must re-roll all of the dice and keep the results of the second roll.

Upgrade.Title: Attack Pattern Omega
Upgrade.Ability: If you damage an opponent's Hull with a [CRITICAL], you may immediately discard this card to search the Damage Deck for a "Warp Core Breach" card instead of drawing a random Damage Card. Re-shuffle the Damage Deck when you are done.

Upgrade.Title: Jadzia Dax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to perform an additional "2" maneuver this round (forward or bank). You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Miles O'Brien
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to repair 2 Shield Tokens. You cannot attack this round.

Upgrade.Title: Once More Unto The Breach
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to allow your Primary Weapon to make a total of 2 attacks this round at -1 attack die each. You may not roll any defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Concussive Charges
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. For every uncanceled [HIT] or [CRITICAL] result, the target ship loses 1 token of your choice that has been placed beside it in the play area. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Kerla
Upgrade.Ability: When defending against a ship at Range 1, you may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATION] results into 1 [EVASIVE] result.

Upgrade.Title: Stex
Upgrade.Ability: If a [CREW] Upgrade on an enemy ship would cause your ship to discard or disable any of your Upgrades, roll 2 defense dice. If you roll at least 1 [EVASIVE] result, ignore the effects of the enemy Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaked Mines
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, you may discard this card to place a Minefield Token within Range 2 of your ship (in any direction) but not within Range 2 of an Enemy ship. If an enemy ship passes within Range 1 of the token, roll 3 attack dice (-1 if the target ship immediately performs a [SCAN] Action). Any [HIT] or [CRITICAL] damages the target ship as normal. The affected ship does not roll any defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Polarized Hull Plating
Upgrade.Ability: When your ship is hit, convert 1 [CRITICAL] into 1 [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Nuclear Missiles
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may re-roll one of your blank results one time.

Upgrade.Title: Long Range Tachyon Scan
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking a ship at Range 3, you may spend 1 [SCAN] Token to force that ship to roll 2 less defense dice this round.

Upgrade.Title: Suicide Attack
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: At the end of the Activation Phase, you must make a 1 Forward Maneuver and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If your ship overlaps an enemy ship, destroy your ship and roll 8 attack dice to damage the enemy ship. That ship rolls defense dice against this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'Hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Phased Polaron Beam
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. All damage inflicted by this attack ignore the opposing ship's Shields. This upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Jem'Hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Omet'Iklan
Upgrade.Ability: Whenever you attack with your Primary Weapon, you may convert 1 result into a [HIT] result. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Virak'Kara
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable this card and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship (even if that ship is Cloaked or has Active Shields). You may then use that Upgrade's Action (if any) as a free Action this round. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Toman'Torax
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Discard this card and 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the target ship (even if that ship is Cloaked or has Active Shields. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Jem'hadar ship.

Upgrade.Title: Redshirt
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, discard this card to cancel any one of your opponent's attack dice of your choice.

Upgrade.Title: N'Garen
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: When attacking this round, you may convert 1 of your [BATTLESTATIONS] results into a [CRITICAL] result all all of your other [BATTLESTATIONS] results into [HIT] results.

Upgrade.Title: Alexander
Upgrade.Ability: Each time your ship is hit for at least 1 damage, place 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token on this card. During the Activation Phase, you may take 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token off this card and place it beside your ship.

Upgrade.Title: EM Pulse
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this card to target a ship at Range 1-2. The targeted ship rolls 1 less attack die and 1 less defense die this round.

Upgrade.Title: Boheeka
Upgrade.Ability: If you ship has a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside it when you attack, you may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Upgrade.Title: Enhanced Weaponry
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. If fired from a Keldon Class ship, add +1 attack die.

Upgrade.Title: Dorsal Weapons Array
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Disable this card to perform this attack. You may fire this weapon in any direction.

Upgrade.Title: Tetryon Emissions
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Disable this Upgrade to add +3 defense dice each time you defend this round.

Upgrade.Title: Cloaking Device
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of performing a normal Action, you may disable this card to perform the [CLOAK] Action. While you have a [CLOAK] token beside your ship, you may perform the [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if this card is disabled. This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points for any non-Keldon class ship.

Upgrade.Title: Captured Intelligence
Upgrade.Ability: Before rolling your defense dice, if you do not have an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship, you may discard this card to place an [EVASIVE] Token beside your ship. In addition, each time you defend during the round use this ability, roll 1 extra defense die.

Upgrade.Title: Feint
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this upgrade to target a ship at range 2-3. If you attack that ship this round, it rolls 2 less defense dice.

Upgrade.Title: Dmitri Valtane
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship has a [SCAN] token beside it when you attack, you may re-roll up to 2 of your attack dice.

Upgrade.Title: Janice Rand
Upgrade.Ability: After your ship moves, discard Rand to allow your captain to perform the action on one of his [TALENT] upgrades as a free action this round.

Upgrade.Title: Lojur
Upgrade.Ability: When your ship fires a [WEAPON] upgrade that requires you to disable it, you may disable Lojur instead of that [WEAPON] upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: Attack: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert one [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Positron Beam
Upgrade.Ability: During the planning phase, you may discard this upgrade to target a ship at range 1 of your ship. That ship immediately receive an auxiliary power token.

Upgrade.Title: Transwarp Drive
Upgrade.Ability: During the activation phase, if your maneuver dial reveals a [STRAIGHT] 4 or [STRAIGHT] 5 maneuver, you may instead use a [STRAIGHT] 6 maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Photon Torpedoes
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and disable this card to perform this attack. You may convert one [BATTLESTATIONS] result into 1 [CRITICAL] result. You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

Upgrade.Title: Advanced Weapon System
Upgrade.Ability: When attacking, you may disable this card before rolling any dice to keep your [CLOAK] token from flipping to its red side.

Upgrade.Title: Massacre
Upgrade.Ability: If your ship inflicts a [CRITICAL] agaisnt an enemy's Hull, discard this card to inflict 1 additional damage to that ship.

Upgrade.Title: Selok
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard Selok to target a ship at Range 1. That ship cannot attack your ship this round.

Upgrade.Title: Ultritium Explosives
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: If your ship is not Cloaked, disable all of your remaining Shields and target a ship at Range 1-2 that is not Cloaked and has no Active Shields. Discard this card and 1 of your [CREW] Upgrades to inflict 1 [CRITICAL] against the target ship.

Upgrade.Title: Disobey Orders
Upgrade.Ability: You may discard this card at any time to replace 1 [EVASIVE][SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] token next to your ship with a [EVASIVE][SCAN] or [BATTLESTATIONS] token.

Upgrade.Title: Christopher Hobson
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Gain +1 attack die when firing at a cloaked ship.

Upgrade.Title: Secondary Torpedo Launcher
Upgrade.Ability: Attack: [TARGET LOCK] Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack. If you have already fired another torpedo at an enemy ship in your forward firing arc this round, you may use this weapon to make a second attack against that ship at -1 attack die. you do not need to spend a second target lock to make the extra attack.

Upgrade.Title: High Energy Sensor Sweep
Upgrade.Ability: After you move, you may disable 1 active shield to perform a free [SCAN] Action.

Resource.Title: Elite Attack Die
Resource.Ability:
1) Once during every round, a player may choose to exchange 1 of their attack dice with the Elite Attack Die. Players may not roll this die more than once per round, regardless of how many ships they have in their fleet.
2) The pips on the Elite Attack Die are [DOUBLE HIT], [CRITICAL], [CRITICAL], [HIT],[HIT],[HIT], [BATTLESTATIONS], [BATTLESTATIONS].
3) The [DOUBLE HIT] result may be canceled by 1 [EVASIVE].
4) The [DOUBLE HIT] result inflicts 2 damage if not canceled.
5) When canceling the attack dice with [EVASIVE] results, the order that the dice are canceled is: [HIT], [DOUBLE HIT], then [CRITICAL].

Resource.Title: Command Tokens
Resource.Ability:
1) Players receive a set of 10 Command Tokens and choose 5 to use. 2) A player may only use Command Tokens for his/her ships. 3) When a Command Token is used, it is flipped over and may not be used again in that Battle.
COMMAND TOKENS: - Place a [EVASIVE] token beside your ship as a Free Action this Round. - Place a [BATTLESTATIONS] token beside your ship as a Free Action this Round. - Place a [SCAN] token beside your ship as a Free Action this Round. - You may [TARGET LOCK] 1 enemy ship as a Free Action this Round. - You may choose any number of your attack dice and re-roll them once. You must keep the results of the 2nd roll. - You may choose any number of your defense dice and re-roll them once. You must keep the results of the 2nd roll. - Before rolling any of your attack dice, you may add +1 attack die to the current attack. - Before rolling any of your defense dice, you may add +1 defense die to the current defense. - Before rolling any of your attack dice, you may set 1 of your attack dice on any side of your choice. This die may not be rolled or re-rolled during this round. - Before rolling any of your defense dice, you may set 1 of your defense dice on any side of your choice. This die may not be rolled or re-rolled during this round.

Resource.Title: Reinforcements Sideboard
Resource.Ability:
1) Prior to the event, players select 1 of each of the following card types and places them in the appropriate section on the Reinforcements Sideboard: 1 Captain Card, 1 [TALENT] Upgrade, 1 [CREW] Upgrade, 1 [TECH] Upgrade and 1 [WEAPON] Upgrade. The total cost of these cards may not exceed 20 SP.
2) During the Activation Phase of any round, a player may use a ship's Action to:
a) Equip that ship with one Upgrade card from his Sideboard. The ship must have an Upgrade slot of the appropriate type available to do this.
OR
b) Exchange 1 Upgrade from his ship with 1 Upgrade of the same type from his Sideboard.
OR
c) Exchange 1 Captain from his ship with 1 Captain from his Sideboard.
3) Upgrades that may only be purchased for certain ship types can only be equipped onto or exchanged to that specific ship type.
4) Place an Auxiliary Power Token beside a ship if the Upgrade that is equiped onto or exchanged to that ship is of a different Faction or if the Upgrade would have an additional cost applied to that ship (i.e. "This Upgrade costs +5 Squadron Points if purchased for...")
5) A Captain or Upgrade may be exchanged multiple times during the game.
6) If a Captain or Upgrade which is currently affected by a game effect (i.e. a critical damage card, disabled token, etc.) is moved to a player's sideboard, that Captain or Upgrade is no longer affected by that game effect. NOTE: If the game effect is a Critical Damage Card, flip the Critical Damage Card face down and leave it with the ship.

Resource.Title: Flagship
Resource.Ability:
1) Players receive a set of 4 flagship cards (with 2 options on each card) and choose 1 of those options to use during the tournament. There are 4 Independent options and 1 option for each faction: Federation, Klingon, Romulan, and Dominion. If a Federation, Klingon, Romulan, or Dominion flagship option is chosen, players must assign a ship of the same faction as their flagship. If an Independent option is chosen, players may assign any ship as their flagship and pay no faction penalty. An independent faction flagship is now independent faction in addition to its original faction.
2) Flagship cards are oversized cards that are placed beneath your ship card. These cards will have additional stats that increase the printed values* of your ship (primary weapon, agility, hull, shields). In addition, flagship cards may add bonus text-based abilities, actions, and upgrade slots to the assigned ship card.
3) Players may use the bonus text-based ability in addition to their ship's normal text-based ability (if applicable) during the battle.
4) If a ship card does not have the bonus action in its action bar, that ship is now considered to have that action in its action bar. If a ship card already has the bonus action in its action bar, that ship may use this action as a free action every round.
5) If there is a bonus (talent) upgrade slot on your chosen flagship option, you may choose a (talent) upgrade even if your captain does not have the (talent) icon on the captain card. This talent is considered to be attached to the captain.
6) Players also receive a special plastic base and pegs that will show which ship is your flagship at a glance. The color of the base and pegs is black.

Sets.Set: Klingon I.K.S. Kronos One Expansion Pack
Dominion 5th Wing Patrol Ship 6 Expansion Pack
Romulan R.I.S. Gal Gath'thong Expansion Pack

Flagship.Title: Romulan
Flagship.Ability: When attacking, all other friendly, Romulan ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may choose any number of their attack dice and re-roll them once.

Flagship.Title: Romulan (Independent)
Flagship.Ability: When defending, all other friendly ships within Range 1 of your Flagship gain +1 defense die.

Flagship.Title: Klingon
Flagship.Ability: When attacking, all other friendly Klingon ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may convert 1 blank result into 1 [HIT] result.

Flagship.Title: Klingon (Independent)
Flagship.Ability: All other friendly ships within Range 1 of your Flagship gain +1 attack die when attacking at Range 2-3.

Flagship.Title: Dominion
Flagship.Ability: When defending, all other friendly Dominion ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may convert 1 blank result into 1 [EVASION] result.

Flagship.Title: Dominion (Independent)
Flagship.Ability: After your Flagship moves, you may target 1 other Friendly ship within Range 1 of your Flagship. Target ship immediately performs an extra white or green Maneuver.

Flagship.Title: Federation
Flagship.Ability: When defending, all other friendly Federation ships within Range 1-2 of your Flagship may choose any number of their defense dice and re-roll them once.

Flagship.Title: Federation (Independent)
Flagship.Ability: After your Flagship moves, you may target 1 other Friendly ship within Range 1 of your Flagship. Target ship immediately performs a 2nd Action listed on its Action Bar as a free Action this round.
